languages.text: "Их души терзает оранжево-синий вихрь. Вы разве не чувствуете, как он заполнил всю комнату? Его цвета... поистине пугают".

traits.locale_text: "Их души терзает оранжево-синий вихрь. Вы разве не чувствуете, как он заполнил всю комнату? Его цвета... поистине пугают".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "A whirlwind of orange and blue torments their souls. Can you not feel its gusts in the air all around us? Its hues are... terrifying indeed."
languages.original_text: "Их души терзает оранжево-синий вихрь. Вы разве не чувствуете, как он заполнил всю комнату? Его цвета... поистине пугают".

traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "A whirlwind of orange and blue torments their souls. Can you not feel its gusts in the air all around us? Its hues are... terrifying indeed."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Un vortex orange et bleu tourmente leurs âmes. Ne sentez-vous pas ses rafales tout autour de nous ? Ses teintes sont... parfaitement terrifiantes. »
languages.original_text: "A whirlwind of orange and blue torments their souls. Can you not feel its gusts in the air all around us? Its hues are... terrifying indeed."

traits.locale_text: « Un vortex orange et bleu tourmente leurs âmes. Ne sentez-vous pas ses rafales tout autour de nous ? Ses teintes sont... parfaitement terrifiantes. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “橙色与蓝色的旋风折磨着他们的灵魂，莫非你感觉不到我们身边这股狂风吗？它的颜色……确实很令人恐惧。”
languages.original_text: "A whirlwind of orange and blue torments their souls. Can you not feel its gusts in the air all around us? Its hues are... terrifying indeed."

traits.locale_text: “橙色与蓝色的旋风折磨着他们的灵魂，莫非你感觉不到我们身边这股狂风吗？它的颜色……确实很令人恐惧。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「オレンジと青の旋風が彼らの魂を苦しめています。あたくしたちの周囲に吹くその突風を感じませんか？その色合いは…とても恐ろしいです」
languages.original_text: "A whirlwind of orange and blue torments their souls. Can you not feel its gusts in the air all around us? Its hues are... terrifying indeed."

traits.locale_text: 「オレンジと青の旋風が彼らの魂を苦しめています。あたくしたちの周囲に吹くその突風を感じませんか？その色合いは…とても恐ろしいです」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ein Wirbelwind aus Orange und Blau peinigt ihre Seelen. Spürt Ihr nicht seine Windböen in der Luft um uns? Seine Farbtöne sind ... wirklich entsetzlich."
languages.original_text: "A whirlwind of orange and blue torments their souls. Can you not feel its gusts in the air all around us? Its hues are... terrifying indeed."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Wirbelwind aus Orange und Blau peinigt ihre Seelen. Spürt Ihr nicht seine Windböen in der Luft um uns? Seine Farbtöne sind ... wirklich entsetzlich."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Una vorágine azul y naranja atormenta sus almas. ¿No nota su soplo en el aire que nos rodea? Sus tonalidades son... terroríficas».
languages.original_text: "A whirlwind of orange and blue torments their souls. Can you not feel its gusts in the air all around us? Its hues are... terrifying indeed."

traits.locale_text: «Una vorágine azul y naranja atormenta sus almas. ¿No nota su soplo en el aire que nos rodea? Sus tonalidades son... terroríficas».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Turuncu ve mavi renkli bir fırtına, ruhlarına eziyet ediyor. Fırtınanın çevremizde esişini hissedemiyor musun? Renk tonu... Gerçekten de korkunç."
languages.original_text: "A whirlwind of orange and blue torments their souls. Can you not feel its gusts in the air all around us? Its hues are... terrifying indeed."

traits.locale_text: "Turuncu ve mavi renkli bir fırtına, ruhlarına eziyet ediyor. Fırtınanın çevremizde esişini hissedemiyor musun? Renk tonu... Gerçekten de korkunç."
